name: slides2pdf
title: Slides2pdf
description: This command converts .pptx files into .pdf using LibreOffice in headless mode.
author: robert_hofmann

commands.name: convert-to-pdf
commands.title: Convert to PDF
commands.subtitle: From Powerpoint
commands.description: Convert a PowerPoint (.pptx) file into a PDF document.

preferences.name: openAfterConvertSingle
preferences.title: Open when single file converted
preferences.label: Open after single convert
preferences.description: Open the generated PDF immediately when converting a single selected file.

preferences.name: openAfterConvertBatch
preferences.title: Open when multiple files converted
preferences.label: Open after batch convert
preferences.description: Open all generated PDFs after converting multiple selected files (after all conversions finish).
